description.value: When the character uses Charm or Intimidate Skills to affect more than one person, they can affect 100x their Fellowship Bonus people, instead of just 10x Fellowship Bonus.

system.benefit: When the character uses Charm or Intimidate Skills to affect more than one person, they can affect 100x their Fellowship Bonus people, instead of just 10x Fellowship Bonus.

specialAbilities.name: Expanded Audience
specialAbilities.description: Can affect 100x Fellowship Bonus targets (instead of 10x) with Charm, Command, and Deceive tests.
